control_attributes.Control: MP-6 (8) REMOTE PURGING / WIPING OF INFORMATION
control_attributes.control_description: The organization provides the capability to purge/wipe information from [Assignment: organization-defined information systems, system components, or devices] either remotely or under the following conditions: [Assignment: organization-defined conditions].
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization downgrades information system media containing [Assignment: organization-defined Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI)] prior to public release in accordance with applicable federal and organizational standards and policies.

Control Statement: The organization provides the capability to purge/wipe information from [Assignment: organization-defined information systems, system components, or devices] either remotely or under the following conditions: [Assignment: organization-defined conditions].
Control Name: MP-6 (8) REMOTE PURGING / WIPING OF INFORMATION
